aslsd.solvers package

Submodules

aslsd.solvers.adam module

class aslsd.solvers.adam.ADAM(**kwargs)

Bases: aslsd.solvers.solver.Solver

Class for ADAM optimizer. .. math:

\theta_{k}^{(t+1)}=\mathrm{proj}_{\Theta_{k}}\left(\theta_{k}^{(t)}+\Delta \theta_{k}^{(t+1)}\right)

where * \(g_{1}^{(t)} =\frac{a_{\mathrm{M} 1} \cdot g_{1}^{(t-1)}+\left(1-a_{\mathrm{M} 1}\right) \cdot \mathcal{G}_{\boldsymbol{T}}^{(\boldsymbol{k})}\left(\theta_{k}^{(t)}\right)}{1-a_{\mathrm{M} 1}^{t}}\); * \(g_{2}^{(t)} =\frac{a_{\mathrm{M} 2} \cdot g_{2}^{(t-1)}+\left(1-a_{\mathrm{M} 2}\right) \cdot \mathcal{G}_{\boldsymbol{T}}^{(\boldsymbol{k})} \odot \mathcal{G}_{\boldsymbol{T}}^{(\boldsymbol{k})}\left(\theta_{k}^{(t)}\right)}{1-a_{\mathrm{M} 2}^{t}}\); * \(\Delta \theta_{k}^{(t)} =-a_{\mathrm{rate}} \cdot \frac{g_{1}^{(t)}}{\sqrt{g_{2}^{(t)}}+a_{\mathrm{E}}}\).

Notes

Diederik P Kingma and Jimmy Ba. Adam: A method for stochastic optimization. In International Conference on Learning Representations, 2015.

aslsd.solvers.momentum module

class aslsd.solvers.momentum.Momentum(**kwargs)

Bases: aslsd.solvers.solver.Solver

Class for a momentum SGD optimizer.

Notes

Qian, Ning. “On the momentum term in gradient descent learning algorithms.” Neural networks 12.1 (1999): 145-151.
